description: React component for the Payments page, including payment history display and checkout initiation.

methods.name: fmtAmount(cents, currency = 'USD')
methods.description: Formats a currency amount based on cents and currency code.

methods.name: fmtDate(dt)
methods.description: Formats a date object or string into a localized date string.

methods.name: Payments()
methods.description: Main React functional component for the Payments page, managing state and rendering UI.

methods.name: loadHistory
methods.description: Fetches the payment history from the backend API.

methods.name: clearSuccessSoon
methods.description: Clears the success message after a short delay.

methods.name: startCheckout
methods.description: Initiates a checkout session by calling the backend API and redirecting the user.

methods.name: renderStatusBadge
methods.description: Renders a styled badge indicating the payment status.
